entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 21.
